Summary: Massive silent triangular craft silently flew overhead
trends: There have been 127 other sightings in San Francisco
There were 3 other sightings in San Francisco on or around November 14th 2010
divs: sighting detailsi was outside having a cigarette at 145 this morning looking at the sky and noticed a huge triangular shaped craft silently cruise overhead. could have easily been the size of a football field. there were 12? lights making out the bottom outline that seemed to form into different shapes as it passed overhead, much in the same way birds flock (but these were not birds). a single light moved in a circular motion inside of the ones on the outside. the lights were red\amber and weren't bright. i don't want to say dim either but they were really noticeable if you were looking up. silently glided by without making a single sound. it seemed to be flying fairly low over the city. since im in an urban area i had to run out to the front of my house into the street as i watched it disappear over the row of houses. blew my mind. anybody else see this?
